entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain showers or periods of drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
